name: Open
description: Your ticket has been submitted and is awaiting response from the team.  This is the default status of a new ticket when it gets generated.

name: In Progress
description: After a ticket is reviewed by the team, it moves to this status.

name: Pending Customer Response
description: If the team needs more information from the customer to resolve the issue, the ticket will be moved to this status.

name: Pending (Maintenance)
description: If the ticket is waiting for a maintenance window and is not being actively worked, the ticket will be moved to this status.

name: Transferred
description: If a ticket moves to another member of the team, it will have this status.

name: Feedback Received
description: When a ticket has been placed in the team's queue, it will have this status.

name: Closed
description: When a ticket has been resolved and you have successfully acknowledged the issue's resolution, you may move a ticket to this status.  Even after itâ€™s closed, you can always respond to the ticket again to reopen it.

name: Hidden
description: INTERNAL - Staff has hidden this ticket.  See notes for more information.

name: Pending (Management)
description: If the ticket is waiting for a team manager's response, the ticket will be moved to this status.

name: On Hold
description: If the ticket is moved to this status,  it is currently waiting on feedback from the team et cetera.  See notes for details.
